name: mega-cuff
effect: Unused.  This appears as the boy player's Mega Bracelet in Pokémon Contests, but it cannot actually be obtained.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
This bracelet contains an untold power that
somehow enables Pokémon carrying a Mega Stone
to Mega Evolve in battle.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
This bracelet contains an untold power that
somehow enables Pokémon carrying a Mega Stone
to Mega Evolve in battle.

somehow enables Pokémon carrying a Mega Stone
